faq.label: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.title: We answer your questions
faq.subtitle: The most common questions about our services.

items.question: How long does a complete renovation take?
items.answer: The time varies depending on the complexity of the project. A standard complete renovation usually takes between 3 and 6 months. At Basis we guarantee realistic deadlines and meet them thanks to our 30+ years of experience.

items.question: Do you manage building permits?
items.answer: Yes, we handle the entire bureaucratic process. From requesting municipal licenses to managing public road occupation. We know the regulations of every municipality in the Balearics.

items.question: Do you work with a fixed budget?
items.answer: Yes. Our transparency policy eliminates surprises. Once the design and materials are approved, the price is fixed, unless you decide to make changes during construction.

items.question: In which areas of the Balearics do you work?
items.answer: We operate throughout the Balearic Islands: Mallorca, Menorca, Ibiza and Formentera. Our headquarters is in Mallorca but we travel to all the islands.
